quote: Mistake is a mistake only if you make it twice. – Robin Sharma
fact: The average North American will eat 35,000 cookies during their life span.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
A weasel walks into a bar. The bartender says, "Wow, I've never served a weasel before. What can I get for you?"
"Pop," goes the weasel.
